lead_paragraph: Giancarlo Stanton stepped to the plate at spring training for the first time Tuesday, took eight swings and never hit the ball more than 100 feet, even though the pitcher was throwing underhand from close range.

headline.print_headline: Stanton Begins Comeback From Another Season-Ending Injury
headline.main: Stanton Begins Comeback From Another Season-Ending Injury

snippet: Giancarlo Stanton stepped to the plate at spring training for the first time Tuesday, took eight swings and never hit the ball more than 100 feet, even though the pitcher was throwing underhand from close range....
